thread.title: Singh Is Bliing box office: Akshay Kumar-starrer earns Rs 45.25 crore
thread.title_full: Singh Is Bliing box office: Akshay Kumar-starrer earns Rs 45.25 crore - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Singh Is Bliing box office: Akshay Kumar-starrer earns Rs 45.25 crore
text:
Akshay Kumar's romantic comedy Singh Is Bliing has had a great opening at the box office.
The film recorded second highest first day collections of the year with a total of Rs 18.25 crore. However, on its second day, the collections dropped by almost 30% as the film managed to earn Rs 12.50 crore.
Singh Is Bliing has also recorded fourth highest weekend worldwide of the year at Rs 77 crore. â€‹
Day 1 Rs 18.25 crore Day 2 Rs 12.50 crore Day 3 Rs 14.50 crore
(Source: Boxofficeindia.com)
